forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 45. Northwest wind 5 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As evening descends upon Downtown San Francisco, the sky stretches wide, a canvas painted in soft shades of twilight. The air, already pleasantly crisp, invites a shiver or two, with temperatures forecasted to settle around 45 degrees. A gentle northwest breeze weaves through the streets, rustling the leaves and carrying whispers of the sea, yet the clouds remain sparse overhead, allowing for a rare moment of clarity in this oft-misty city. Glimpses of the Golden Gate Bridge stand defiant against the gleaming waters, unmarred by fog, as daylight wanes.

Tomorrow promises a splendid sunny reprieve, with temperatures nudging the high 50s before a slight dip in the afternoon. The gentleness of the wind continues its serenade, suggesting a day well-suited for strolls along the waterfront or perhaps a casual visit to one of the quiet cafés perched along the city’s vibrant avenues. As the weather remains inviting, light layers will be your ally for the shifting temperatures throughout the day—perhaps a cardigan over a simple tee, perfectly paired with comfortable shoes for exploring the local neighborhoods steeped in character. With such splendid weather, one could wander among the streets, perhaps losing track of time in the intersections of art and history that define this cherished city.
